webPage.name: Social Media Recruitment & Scheduling Software | Flowxtra
webPage.description: Plan, approve, and publish hiring content across LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok from one collaborative workspace. Flowxtra combines social media scheduling with ATS workflows for talent teams.

mainEntity.name: How does Flowxtra streamline social media recruitment?

acceptedAnswer.text: Teams can create hiring campaigns, schedule posts, approve content, and track engagement for LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and WhatsApp directly from Flowxtra.

mainEntity.name: Can I manage content approvals for my team?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Collaborators can draft posts, request edits, add notes, and log approvals so every hiring update stays on brand and compliant.
